{{{class="brush: bash"
#!/bin/bash
if test "$1" = ""
	then
		echo "No convert source"
		exit
fi

if [ ! -d $1 -a ! -f $1 ]
	then
		echo "Dir of file not exists"
		exit
fi

rd()
{
	if [ -f $1 ]
	   then
		   /usr/bin/dos2unix $1
	elif [ -d $1 ]
	then
		LS=`ls $1`
		for i in $LS
			do
				CHILD="$1/$i"
			rd $CHILD
		done
	else
		echo "$1 not exists"
	fi
}
rd $1
}}}
